mdRecord.dcterms:title: Battle-field of Five Forks: "Cotton" map, No. 2
Battlefield of Five Forks
Cotton map, no. 2
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cotton, J. P. civil engineer [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map ; 44 x 35 cm. on sheet 56 x 48 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by spot heights and pictorially. [original]
"Battle-field of Five Forks" printed below the map; "Cotton" map No. 2" appears at top of sheet. [original]
Tables: April 1st. 1865; positions of sun in the sky -- Mean time of rising & setting of sun & setting of moon. [original]
Lists Union and Confederate Army units participating in the battle, and locates features of the landscape. [original]
This map presumably issued in one of the publications of the Warren Court of Inquiry held in 1883. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Some handwritten changes and additions to map. Linen-backed, with some loss of image at old fold lines. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Warren, G. K. (Gouverneur Kemble), 1830-1882
Five Forks, Battle of, Va., 1865--Maps
Five Forks (Dinwiddie County, Va.)--Maps
